column4: how do i change the permission of an files & folder wont by root to narmal user ?? :)
how do change the permission of files & folder owned by root to normal user ??
i feel like you want to change _owner_ of the file
how exactly i need full format/ command.
i tried chmod but i dint work out, may be some work syntax.
that was full, just replace user and file
you do not want to chMOD, you want to chOWN, to change OWNER, not privileges
you might want to read unix file permissions tutoria/primer or like
i'm now able to access the folder, but still i can see that "Lock icon " on folder, why is that so. ?
just read and understand, then you'll probably know  :)

if you want to write to folder you need either own the folder and have rwx for owner, or belong to group which the folder belongs to and have rwx for group or have rwx for world (other) for the folder
locate finds if the file _existed_ 24+ hours ago
